body.subject: Requirements ready for planning - Epic 28 God Agent Alfred
body.summary: Requirements.json prepared for Epic 28. Need implementation plan sequencing workstreams: domain contracts, memory fabric, intent routing, skill adapters, consensus bridge, presentation integration, observability.
key_points: 7 workstreams identified: Domain & Contracts, Memory Fabric + Persona Merge, Intent Routing & Planner, Skill Adapters (5 skills), Consensus Bridge + Safety, Presentation & Voice, Observability & QA
Acceptance criteria require smoke tests covering at least one flow per skill
Performance targets: < 5s for concierge, < 30s for multi-step flows, < 150ms memory retrieval
Token budgets from role prompts must be respected by planner
Reuse existing test fixtures and use cases; skill adapters should call existing application layer services
Pet project context: owner will manually test and provide feedback; no automated simulation scripts
concerns: Plan depth: need hard cap on plan depth + watchdog timers to prevent runaway tasks
Skill drift: ensure adapters call existing use cases to avoid regressions
Memory bloat: need summary compression + TTL policies to stay within token budgets
Consensus latency: async queue + notifications required; only critical steps trigger full consensus
Test coverage: minimum 80% required per project rules; unit + integration + smoke tests needed
body.action_needed: Read requirements.json and architecture.json (once available), then emit plan.json with workstream sequencing, ETA estimates, risk mitigations, and testing strategy. Ensure test coverage â‰¥ 0.6 for auto-approval.
